channel.title: [508] Option choosing? [508]

item.title: [508] Option choosing? [508]
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

I made my ghost sailor have options to sail, and here’s my code/info:

Name: Ghost Sailor
Supposed to: Teleport me to cities
NPC ID: 1703

It has 3 options.

Now here’s what I put in actionbuttons.java:

if(p.Choice == 1)
{
p.Choice = 0;
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 1703);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9827, 1703, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 744, 1703, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, "Ghost Sailor", 1703, 3);
p.setCoords(2442, 3090, 0);
}
else
if(p.Choice == 2)
{
p.Choice = 0;
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.setCoords(2442, 3090, 0);
}
else

if(p.Choice == 3)
{
p.Choice = 0;
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.setCoords(2442, 3090, 0);
}

All I want it to do is to take me to different cities, the 1st one isn’t right, as I was just testing.

Now whenever I talk to the Ghost Sailor, and I pick the 1st choice, it just says what the slayer master says, Heres your skillcape!

How would I make the code apply to my ghost sailor?

Read full topic
